product_name: Mountain Hardwear Ravi Baseball Cap - Men's
long_description: Offering cool coverage on sunny adventures, the Mountain Hardwear Ravi Baseball Cap includes a stowaway sun flap to save your neck in case you forget to slap some sunscreen on it. Stretch nylon fabric wicks moisture away from skin, dries quickly and features UPF 25 sun protection. Internal forehead panel and headband feature Cool Q.(TM) ZERO fabric, which is designed to provide continuous cooling. 7.5 in. sun flap shades neck and stows neatly inside cap when not needed.
short_description: Offering cool coverage on sunny adventures, the Mountain Hardwear Ravi Baseball Cap includes a stowaway sun flap to save your neck in case you forget to slap some sunscreen on it.
